name: Night Loop
description:
You are trapped in a Timeloop by a mysterious entity. You actively try to escape while something stops you from

Will you escape?

To escape the Timeloop you need to get out of your house, but its easier said than done. You need to solve puzzles in and hide from something in order to do so. Also, use your flashlight sparingly because it has a batteryLMB - Interact

RMB - Flashlight

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look
